title: FortiGate fails to log traffic for Fortinet owned IP address range
summary: FortiGate may fail to record traffic destined to Fortinet owned IP addresses i.e. traffic destined to the following subnets: 173.243.128.0/20, 96.45.32.0/20 As an example, traffic generated by FortiClient/FortiClient EMS via the FortiGate in order to request updates from the FortiGuard distributed servers may not be logged under Logs > forward traffic logs.

operating_system.description: FortiOS: greater equal 6.0.0, less equal 6.0.11, fixed in 6.4.0
FortiOS: greater equal 6.2.0, less equal 6.2.5, fixed in 6.4.0
